LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RawRice.label: Make a Straw rice bag (rice)
LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RawRice.description: 300 rice can be stored, and it can be sold as an agricultural product./n CAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased yield once opened.

LanguageData.MakeStrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.description: 300 Momi can be stored, and it can be sold as an agricultural product./n CAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased yield once opened.

LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RawRice.label: Open Straw rice bag (rice)
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RawRice.description: CAUTION: Due to frequent rips and tears in handling, some contents may spoil, leading to a decreased yield once opened.
LanguageData.UnwindStrawRiceBag_RawRice.jobString: Tearing open bag with reckless abandon.
